item.title: JFass - A New Serverless Platform with Customized JVM Runtime
item.description: Faas (Function as a service) is one form of serverless computing where users only need to deploy function on the cloud and the cloud service vendor will handle all the hardware resources the function needs. The vendor will provide runtimes for these functions which are driven by events. However, Faas is tailored for short-lived functions which makes traditional runtime optimizations such as JIT compilation fail to enhance performance. We want to design a new framework to bridge the gap between modern language runtime and serverless platforms.
